title: Cashew Crab Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 2 cans (6 oz) lump crabmeat, drained & picked through
1 can (14 oz) artichoke hearts, drained & chopped
1 cup regular or low fat mayonnaise
instructions: In skillet, cook and stir pepper, green onions, and jalapenos in oil until tender. Mix crabmeat, artichokes, mayonnaise and cheese; stir in pepper mixture. Spoon into a greased 1-quart casserole; top with cashew halves. Bake at 375Â°F for 25 to 30 minutes or until bubbly. Serve warm as a dip with assorted Nabisco crackers.
